name: Crown Castle Inc.
description: Crown Castle Inc. is a leading provider of shared communications infrastructure in the United States, specializing in the development and management of cell towers and fiber networks. Founded in 1994 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, Crown Castle plays a crucial role in enabling wireless communication and connectivity for mobile operators, enterprises, and local governments. The company owns and operates over 40,000 cell towers and approximately 80,000 route miles of fiber, making it one of the largest infrastructure providers in the country. Crown Castle is committed to investing in advanced technologies and expanding its infrastructure to meet the growing demand for mobile data and connectivity, driven by the proliferation of smartphones, IoT devices, and the rollout of 5G networks. With a strong focus on sustainability, Crown Castle integrates eco-friendly practices into its operations and seeks to minimize its environmental impact. The company’s mission is to empower customers with the tools and infrastructure necessary to deliver seamless and reliable communication services, contributing to the digital transformation of communities across the U.S.
